wikipedia_page.main: Judy Farr is a British art director and set decorator. She was nominated at the 83rd Academy Awards for her work on the film The King's Speech in the category of Best Art Direction. She shared her nomination with Eve Stewart.In addition, she has been nominated for two Emmy's. For the TV show Downton Abbey and the 1999 mini-series Cleopatra.
